page.title: 09ST. DAVID'S FOUNDATION
page.content: {St. David'S Foundation}is an organisation set up to help the terminally ill and their families. It is situated in Cambrian House, formally the residence of{Thomas {Spittle,}a mid-eighteenth century Iron Foundry owner.{The hospice,}which was officially opened in 1984 by the Prince and Princess of Wales, offers many facilities to the patients. The majority of patients in there attend daily, some pursuing activities such as pottery, painting and needlecraft, others enjoying reading, playing games or simply chatting with other patients. This enables their families to have a break. Other facilities in the building include a general store, hairdressing salon and a chapel. The hospice is run by eight qualified nurses and numerous volunteers 24 hours a day.
